title: Bang: Memoirs of a Relationship Assassin
description: DON'T NEED THE OTHER HALF ANY MORE?TAKE THEM OUT.So, you've hired a detective agency to prove your partner is cheating on you. But there's no evidence to be found. Who you gonna call?Me. I am the assassin. Your friend. Anything your other half secretly desires, whatever makes her give in to temptation... that's who I'll become. Get close to her. Take her out. Bang. That's what a relationship assassin does. Infidelity for hire! But don't think I'm heartless. I'm a professional. I've got Rules to protect my targets. Rules to stop them getting too close to the real me. Rules that were blown away when three extraordinary women – the seductress, the celebrity, and the office girl – turned my world inside out. And for a relationship assassin, having an other half was like shooting myself in the heart...
author: David Wailing
